meanings.sent1: Cohoes is a small town in New York.
meanings.sent2: I visited Cohoes last summer and enjoyed the historic buildings.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken cross the road in Cohoes? To explore the city!
meanings.sent4: The bustling streets of Cohoes are like a river flowing with people.
meanings.sent5: The charm of Cohoes lies in its quaint neighborhoods and friendly residents.

meanings.sent1: My favorite dish at the restaurant is the grilled cohoes.
meanings.sent2: Coho salmon is known for its rich flavor and tender texture.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cohoes refuse to share the spotlight? Because it wanted to be the main course!
meanings.sent4: The cohoes swimming upstream symbolize determination and strength.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the cohoes glistened in the sunlight.
